dynaForm.PROCESS_UID: SELECT PRO.PRO_UID, CON.CON_VALUE FROM PROCESS AS PRO, CONTENT AS CON WHERE PRO.PRO_UID = CON.CON_ID AND CON.CON_CATEGORY = 'PRO_TITLE' AND CON.CON_LANG = '@#LANG' ORDER BY CON.CON_VALUE ASC Process- Select a process -
dynaForm.TRIGGER_UID: SELECT TGR.TRI_UID, CON.CON_VALUE FROM TRIGGERS AS TGR, CONTENT AS CON WHERE TGR.PRO_UID = '@#PROCESS_UID' AND TGR.TRI_UID = CON.CON_ID AND CON.CON_CATEGORY = 'TRI_TITLE' AND CON.CON_LANG = '@#LANG' ORDER BY CON.CON_VALUE ASC Trigger- Select a trigger -
dynaForm.TRIGGER_UID_AUX: SELECT TGR.TRI_UID FROM TRIGGERS AS TGR WHERE TGR.TRI_UID = '@#TRIGGER_UID'
dynaForm.TRI_DESCRIPTION: SELECT CON.CON_VALUE FROM CONTENT AS CON WHERE CON.CON_ID = '@#TRIGGER_UID' AND CON.CON_CATEGORY = 'TRI_DESCRIPTION' AND CON.CON_LANG = '@#LANG' Description of the new trigger
dynaForm.TRI_WEBBOT: SELECT TGR.TRI_WEBBOT FROM TRIGGERS AS TGR WHERE TGR.TRI_UID = '@#TRIGGER_UID' Script
